text.tspan: Minions cannot attack, they are just blockers.
When a Minions dies you get one grave = soul to be released
the Minions spot is unusable until used for a spell. Goes back in
- does X dmg to every Enemy
- Minion buff and automatic soul release (after X turn)
- Spell heavy, can sacrify live minion for spell
- Defense/Hero oriented, only 3 minions no retiliation
Full draw every turn / draw to 5
Map : Slay the spire rogue lite
